entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
